examples.korean: industrial development on the periphery of the town 발음듣기 그 소도시 주변부의 산업 개발 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: industrial development on the periphery of the town 발음

examples.korean: At that time the industry was floundering. 발음듣기 그 당시에는 그 산업이 허우적거릴 때였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: At that time the industry was floundering. 발음

examples.korean: The music industry is an incestuous business. 발음듣기 음악 산업은 끼리끼리 문화가 심한 사업이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The music industry is an incestuous business. 발음

examples.korean: to protect domestic industry from foreign predators 발음듣기 국내 산업을 외국의 포식자들로부터 보호하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to protect domestic industry from foreign predators 발음

examples.korean: The government has pledged to clean up industrial emissions. 발음듣기 정부가 산업용 배기가스 정화를 약속했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government has pledged to clean up industrial emissions. 발음
